body.name: Libman Tornado Spin Mop System - Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set for Floor Cleaning - 2 Total Mop Heads Included, Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 10 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ALL-IN-ONE SYSTEM: Say goodbye to the days of messy, wet hands from mopping floors. With the spin mop and bucket system, you can easily clean your floors without ever having to touch a wet mop head
MICROFIBER MOP HEAD: 2 microfiber mop heads included, effortlessly swap out a dirty mop head for a fresh one, ensuring you always have a clean mop ready to tackle the toughest of messes in no time

SPIN TECHNOLOGY: To remove excess water from the mop head, simply release the locking lever and push the handle down into the spin chamber. The more force you apply, the drier the mop head will become
IMPROVED MOP BUCKET: The mop bucket holds up to 2 gallons of water and has a convenient pour spout. The handle is designed to eliminate the sloshing of dirty water as you carry the bucket
MACHINE WASHABLE: Wash mop head by hand or machine in warm, soapy water then lay flat to dry. Keep in mind that the mop head should not be machine dried, bleached, or used with fabric softener
body.description: The Libman Tornado Spin Mop System is the perfect all-in-one mopping solution for effortless cleaning. Its innovative design boasts a generously-sized microfiber mop head that effectively absorbs and removes more water, leaving your floors drier and cleaner in no time. The heavy-duty bucket and spinning chamber work together seamlessly to efficiently remove dirt and excess water from the mop head, making it a great choice for deep cleaning or everyday use. Designed with precision and built to last, this mop features an expertly molded lower handle that can withstand impacts and heavy use. The locking tab is designed for easy unlocking, allowing you to wring the mop head efficiently and get back to cleaning. With every pump of the handle, the mop head becomes drier, giving you complete control and customization over your cleaning experience. Say goodbye to traditional mops that leave your floor too wet or too dry, and switch to the Tornado Spin Mop for a superior cleaning experience Overall, the Libman Tornado Spin Mop System is a reliable and convenient cleaning solution that makes mopping a breeze. It's a must-have tool for anyone looking to maintain a sparkling clean home without the hassle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Libman Tornado Spin Mop System with Extra Refill 2 Extra Large Microfiber Mop Heads 2 machine washable, microfiber mop heads to keep your floors clean with no interruptions. Easy to Operate Just flip the lever and push the mop handle down inside the spin chamber to spin away excess water - leaving your floors to dry faster after mopping. Amazing Bucket The 2-gallon bucket is equipped with a pour spout and handle to prevent spilling while emptying or carrying. Family Made Family Made in the USA with Globally Sourced materials.

Works for All Hard Floors Use on hardwood, laminate, tile, ceramic, and more! Extra thick mop head has longer strands to reach under cabinets and furniture. The microfiber is tough enough to scrub stuck-on messes from your floors, but soft enough that it won't scratch. Use it as an everyday mop for your floors to wipe away dust, dirt, and debris from kitchens, bathrooms, dining rooms, and offices. Or, use it for more heavy duty cleaning for larger messes. You can even use it for your walls!

Convenient, Durable, & Long-Lasting The Libman Tornado Spin Mop System is built to last and makes quick work of your toughest messes. The bucket is molded with a convenient pour spout for easy emptying of dirty water. The handle is designed to prevent the bucket from tipping while carrying, unlike many other mop buckets that tip when full. The spin chamber easily spins away excess water from your mop head so you can control how wet the mop is and how fast your floors dry.
America's Trusted Brand Name in Cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Libman Spin Mop
reviews.reviewText: I love this mop. I had one similar for a while, I broke it, had to find me a new one. I couldn't find one like the one I broke, I got this one because it was the closest. I like it better than my older one. I've saw some reviews complain about it not spinning sturdy, it does, of course it's gotta be placed in properly, I just mean straight, that's it. Put it in straight it spins fine. I've got a lot to mop, I want a mop I like, I guess if you know, you know lol The bucket on this one is bigger than my older one, that's definitely a plus for me. I almost didn't buy, because of some of the reviews. It's made fine, not cheaply made. I wanted to wait to do this review, but if it happens to break, which I doubt, I'll update my review. And it shipped really fast. That's always good. I saw a review about it breaking easily, the only reason I could see that is user error. Like, maybe being to rough with it. It works, it's good. If your looking for a good, clean, mop, buy it. You won't regret it and can't go wrong. And you can buy extra refills when you want them. My older one, I had problems finding proper refills for it. My old mop, when id spin it, it would spin water every where, this one does not do that. I was used to it, never really thought much about it. Until I used this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall performance is top notch
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Libman Tornado Spin Mop System, and it has been a game-changer in my cleaning routine. Performance wise, this mop makes cleaning a breeze with its efficient spinning action that wrings out excess water, leaving my floors spotless and nearly dry. The microfiber mop head is large in size while also being highly effective at trapping dirt and grime, and it's machine washable, which is a bonus. The sturdy build and easy maneuverability of this mop are impressive. It has made floor cleaning less of a chore and more of a joy. The value commensurates with the cost. I highly recommend the Libman Tornado Spin Mop System to anyone looking for an efficient and convenient way to keep their floors clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good mop and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broken but easily replaced
reviews.reviewText: My first thoughts were why was this plastic mopping kit packages with minimal cardboard? My first package came broken. The return process is easy of course and I received a replacement before I had a chance to drop the original return.All that aside, the mop is efficient, comes with a replacement head and doesn’t let anything truly stick to the cleaning head while still managing to clean and remove stains. This is also in conjunction with a good cleaning solution.Removing the dirty water is easy without having to flip it over. It comes with a hole at the top that just requires you to tilt it over.My biggest pet peeve come with “breaking it in.” The mop has a swirl handle that allows you to squeeze water out without touching the mop. The problem is that in the beginning, you have to touch the top portion of the mop to get the mechanism working. After mopping my house twice, it finally works as it should.I wish Amazon packaged some packages better but for the price and ease of returns, I’m not mad. I used to have a different, similar system, but I prefer this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ease of using it.
reviews.reviewText: I like that the same container, holds your mop water, and also wrings out your mop by spinning it without any effort at all. The mop is a good size and lightweight. The handle makes the bucket easy to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mop is easy to use once you watch a video. It is sturdy. You can apply pressure to scrub a good sized space. I don't have to get my hands all wet over and over. I love the ergonomics of the bucket. And mopping is quicker because of the mop head covers a good amount of space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is all plastic, now!
reviews.reviewText: I like how it works, that it is made in the USA but do not like the changes. The metal should make it more durable. I bought another for a vacation cabin without reading about the changes. I am keeping it but feel skeptical as it is not as well made as my first bucket/mop product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large size, heavy duty mop.
reviews.reviewText: Nice large size and heavy duty mop. The mops needs to be on a swivel so that it doesn't flip upside down when you are mopping. All in all, it is a very good mop. It is better than the more expensive one. We have had both.
